justification: Captures some of Team B’s incentives (zero-RB, dual-threat QB upgrade) but ignores B’s strong preference for rookies/consensus—Cameron Scott is a Tier 1 rookie likely valued highly. Minimal attention to B’s injury-buy tendency and QB bye overlap (Green/Holt both Week 10). Trade is roster-coherent and plausible, but A overpays and rationale is thin, lacking specifics on roles, byes, and playoff outlooks.
